Program Listing for File tree.hpp¶

↰ Return to documentation for file (tree.hpp)

#pragma once
#include "core.hpp"
namespace tree {
ll const sz = 30;
tm() struct no {
    vector<no *> p;
    T v;
    no(T const &v_, no *pa = nullptr) : p(sz), v(v_) {
        if (!pa) {
            pa = &this;
        }
        fo(i, sz) {
            p[i] = pa;
            pa = pa->p[i];
        }
    }
    auto gt(ll h) {
        bt b(h);
        auto x = &this;
        fo(i, sz) {
            if (b[i]) {
                x = x->p[i];
            }
        }
        return x;
    }
    operator bool() { return p[0] != &this; }
    auto dp() {
        bt b;
        auto x = this;
        for (const auto &i : rev(ra{sz})) {
            if (*x.p[i]) {
                x = *x.p[i];
                b[i] = 1;
            }
        }
        return ll(b.to_ullong()) + 1;
    }
};
tm() auto lca(no<T> *a, no<T> *b) {
    ll da = a->dp(), db = b->dp();
    if (da > db) {
        swap(a, b);
    }
    b = b->gt(db - da);
    if (a == b) {
        return a;
    }
    for (const auto &i : rev(ra{sz})) {
        if (a->p[i] != b->p[i]) {
            a = a->p[i];
            b = b->p[i];
        }
    }
    assert(a->p[0] == b->p[0]);
    return a->p[0];
}
} // namespace tree
using namespace tree;
